id.description: The id of the blob. It always contains a full commit sha hash and is always a URL relative to the host address.

type.description: The type of the resource. This is always "blobs".

content.example:
Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit.
Nullam congue, neque ut fermentum pretium

encoding.description: The encoding of the content. This is either "plain" for plain text or "base64" for Base64-encoded binary data.

path.description: The file path relative to the repository root

self.description: A canonical URL to this resource
